channel.title: [PI] Player facing
channel.description:
Currently when a player attacks another player one player will be facing the player but the other will be facing away
I know the fix is in attackplayer.java but I've tried to add [code]c.facePlayer(id); / c.facePlayer(int); c.facePlayer();[/code]
But I get different errors for the different code used :/

item.title: [PI] Player facing
item.dc:creator: @squirt_irl squirt irl
item.description:
@squirt_irl wrote:

Eh? Don’t get that haha

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Player facing
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

0x1 Updating the player's current interacting-entity is done via mask 0x1. The entity id is written as a little-endian unsigned short.

0x2 Facing coordinate updating is signified by the 0x2 mask. The player’s facing-towards X and Y are set to read values; specifically, an unsigned lower-inverted short and little-endian unsigned short, respectively.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Player facing
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Make a variable which will recognize the other player being attacked, then use that to make the other player face

Read full topic
